Title: The Howl
Writer: Tinto Brass, Gian Carlo Fusco (dialogue), Franco Longo, Gigi Proietti (dialogue)
Actors: Tina Aumont, Gigi Proietti, Nino Segurini, Germano Longo
Plot: A runaway bride and an eccentric vagrant embark on a surreal journey in a twisted world reflecting 60s pop culture, sex, and politics.
